message:
Geeks, 
I am having trouble running ASP.NET MVC on Linux, anyone who is developing ASP.NET MVC on Linux please ping me here. 

For some reason, Kestrel hangs when activating MVC middleware. I would appreciate it if you have tried this hands on.

P.S. 

I have started a group for those interested in the gory details here:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/ASPNETLINUX/

data.message:
It would be better to use a virtual machine for ASP.NET ( in case you are a linux user ).
Running Microsoft applications is not a good idea.
It wont give you the same performance.

Why not make an issue on the ASP.NET 5 repo on github?
Or maybe ask on their jabbr channel :)

Ok so this was the issue

"EntityFramework.SQLite": "7.0.0-rc1-final", "EntityFramework.SQLite.Design": "7.0.0-rc1-final",
Instead of
"EntityFramework.Sqlite": "7.0.0-rc1-final",
"EntityFramework.Sqlite.Design": "7.0.0-rc1-final",
Notice that first 2 lines were what the intellisense completed ...
AND I had to update the MVC reference version also in Project.Json
